Text:
Really appreciate your continuing HIGH quality rips!

Cheers mate!

BTW, are you gonna post the Theatrical too?  Is it worth the effort do you think, or is this version better...?

Thanks!

DC is more "audience friendly picture" according to some critics, whatever that means lol. 
Both cuts got a couple of different scenes. Some say theatrical is better probably because of the bigger amount of blood lol. I personally wouldn't bother with the other cut once I got this one but it's up to you guys which one you go for. 
Often shorter versions are better with some boring/useless scenes removed. Some longer versions of some movies make (some of) us yawn.
